channel.title: ClanChat RedStone Fix
channel.description:
Okay first off, Please dont flame me, this is my second tutorial.
Bases tested on: Airscape
Okay, you every wonder why when you click on the clan chat button and the ignore button's redstone comes up? Well i have a solution for it, and again, people that actually understand how to code probably got this fixed already, but this is just for people who don't know how to fix this.
Heres what it looks like in case you dont know what im talking about. [IMG]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l517/MoparTutorial/before.jpg[/img]
Step #1~
Open your Client folder.
Step #2~
Open your Client.java
Step #3~
Hit Ctrl G on your keyboard, this should work on all text editors.
Step #4~
Type in 9685 where it asks you what line number.
Step #5~
You should see this. [code] if(anInt1221 == 7) { aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_866.method348(80, 16083, 1); //clan tab
}[/code]
Change the 80 in that to 113.
Then save, exit.
Compile, Click Play,
And click on your clan chat button,
And your finished.
Heres what it looks like when your done.
[img]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l517/MoparTutorial/after.jpg[/img]
Credits:
100% MEEEE.

item.title: ClanChat RedStone Fix
item.dc:creator: @Steve734 Steve734
item.description:
@Steve734 wrote:

Okay first off, Please dont flame me, this is my second tutorial.

Bases tested on:
Airscape

Okay, you every wonder why when you click on the clan chat button and the ignore button’s redstone comes up? Well i have a solution for it, and again, people that actually understand how to code probably got this fixed already, but this is just for people who don’t know how to fix this.

Heres what it looks like in case you dont know what im talking about.

Step #1~

Open your Client folder.

Step #2~

Open your Client.java

Step #3~

Hit Ctrl G on your keyboard, this should work on all text editors.

Step #4~

Type in 9685 where it asks you what line number.

Step #5~

You should see this.

[code] if(anInt1221 == 7)
{
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_866.method348(80, 16083, 1); //clan tab

                }[/code]

Change the 80 in that to 113.

Then save, exit.

Compile, Click Play,

And click on your clan chat button,

And your finished.

Heres what it looks like when your done.

Credits:

100% MEEEE.
